alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 27 at 1:33PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Dauphin, Lancaster, Lebanon, Schuylkill and York. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A frontal system is bringing showers and thunderstorms to the area this afternoon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
